Introduction

Park Xiyeon (formely just known as Xiyeon) is a South Korean actress, singer-songwriter, composer and rapper currently under Saero Actors.

She is a former member of the girl group PRISTIN. She was a contestant on the reality survival show, Produce 101, but was eliminated after ranking 25th place.
